biotools.summary:
computational framework for template-based RNA secondary structure visualisation across non-coding RNA types.

The R2DT software (RNA 2D Templates) automatically generates RNA secondary structure in standard layouts using templates from the following sources:.

This is an embeddable component that you can include into your website to visualise RNA secondary structures.

Visualise RNA secondary structure in standard orientations.

Visualise RNA secondary structure using standard layouts.

Visualise RNA secondary structure in standard orientations using RNA 2D Templates (R2DT).
